permissions: Admins can list efficiency incidents. Non-admins can list incidents whose subjects are within their policy scope (subject-specific policy scope with can_mutate true) for valid subject types.
validation_notes: --subject and --subject-id cannot be used together. --subject-id requires --subject-type. --subject must use Type|ID with allowed types: Broker, Customer, Trucker, Developer, Contractor, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, JobProductionPlan, TenderJobScheduleShift, ProjectTransportPlan. --subject-type values are limited to: JobProductionPlan, TenderJobScheduleShift, Broker, Customer, Trucker, Developer, Contractor, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, ProjectTransportPlan. Boolean filters require true/false values: --has-parent, --has-equipment, --has-live-action-items, --zero-incident-tags, --did-stop-work. Date filters: --start-on/--start-on-min/--start-on-max require YYYY-MM-DD; --start-at-min/--start-at-max/--end-at-min/--end-at-max require ISO 8601 timestamps. --natures values must be valid incident natures: personal, property. --status values must be valid incident statuses: open, closed, abandoned, processing, parked. --kind values must be valid incident kinds: over_trucking. --severity values must be valid incident severities: low, medium, high, catastrophic. If --net-impact-dollars is set, the CLI uses it to populate missing --net-impact-dollars-min and --net-impact-dollars-max.

flags.name: status
flags.validation: Values must be valid incident statuses: open, closed, abandoned, processing, parked.

flags.name: kind
flags.validation: Values must be valid incident kinds: over_trucking.

flags.name: severity
flags.validation: Values must be valid incident severities: low, medium, high, catastrophic.

flags.name: job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID (comma-separated)

flags.name: job-production-plan-project
flags.description: Filter by job production plan project ID (comma-separated)

flags.name: subject
flags.validation: Format: Type|ID. Allowed types: Broker, Customer, Trucker, Developer, Contractor, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, JobProductionPlan, TenderJobScheduleShift, ProjectTransportPlan.

flags.name: subject-type
flags.description: Filter by subject type (Broker, Customer, JobProductionPlan, etc.)
flags.validation: Allowed values: JobProductionPlan, TenderJobScheduleShift, Broker, Customer, Trucker, Developer, Contractor, MaterialSupplier, MaterialSite, ProjectTransportPlan.

flags.name: has-parent
flags.validation: Value must be true or false.

flags.name: has-equipment
flags.validation: Value must be true or false.

flags.name: has-live-action-items
flags.description: Filter by has live action items (true/false)
flags.validation: Value must be true or false.

flags.name: zero-incident-tags
flags.validation: Value must be true or false.

flags.name: tender-job-schedule-shift
flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift ID (comma-separated)

flags.name: tender-job-schedule-shift-driver
flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift driver ID (comma-separated)

flags.name: tender-job-schedule-shift-trucker
flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift trucker ID (comma-separated)

flags.name: responsible-person
flags.description: Filter by responsible person user ID (comma-separated)

flags.name: natures
flags.validation: Values must be valid incident natures: personal, property.

flags.name: did-stop-work
flags.validation: Value must be true or false.

flags.name: net-impact-dollars
flags.description: Filter by exact net impact dollars

flags.name: net-impact-dollars-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum net impact dollars

flags.name: net-impact-dollars-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum net impact dollars
